title: Ticket #4473: condor_ft-gahp doesn't work with older condor_gridmanager
description: The version string given via the CONDOR_VERSION command (added to the ft-gahp in 8.1.1) is ignored when the ft-gahp instantiates a FileTransfer object. Thus, the ft-gahp always thinks it's talking to a peer that's the same version as itself.
remarks:
2014-Aug-07 11:39:37 by tim:
CODE REVIEW: The change looks good.
check_ins:
2014-Jul-31 11:54   Check-in [40807]: minor edits to 2 8.2.2 version history items #4473 #4434 (By Karen Miller )
2014-Jul-31 11:38   Check-in [40803]: Docs for ft-gahp CONDOR_VERSION bug fix. #4473 (By Jaime Frey )
2014-Jul-18 13:48   Check-in [40703]: ft-gahp was ignoring peer version given by CONDOR_VERSION command. #4473 If the job ad for a given transfer request didn't have a CondorVersion attribute, then the ft-gahp assumed the peer for the transfer was the same version as itself. (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
